TopicTitle: The ultra lollagger - funny large lagger

Articles.Content:
Note: There is not download yet because it\'s too big. will load during the night. Also needs Jellycubes modular missiles

The Ultra lollagger is the latest addition to my XFP series. The first versions were your typical, large, 3-engine aircraft that has a JATO capability. However in the pursuit of moar boostars, I accidentally clicked the wing. Then an idea came to me: copy & paste the wings with the engines! So, I copied & pasted em 2 times, and got a 7-engine behemoth. I also discovered it causes a LOT of lag.

Kudos to who can use it without lag once its up!

Pic 1 shows front in VAB

Pic 2 shows the front at runway

Pic 3 shows the back at runway
